arts.ttl: Porath and Harres reflect on "surreal" Kiel performance
arts.sum: The party was on in Schleswig Holstein after Kiel's "Störche" secured their second home win of the season.

arts.ttl: Thorup and Tietz rage after Augsburg bellyflop: "Abysmal and catastrophic."
arts.sum: FC Augsburg trainer Jess Thorup and FCA striker Philipp Tietz were understandably in a cryptic mood after Saturday's shellacking at the hands of Holstein Kiel.

arts.ttl: Reports: Kiel set to acquire Slovenian defender
arts.sum: Two sources report that Holstein Kiel are close to signing a defensive reinforcement.

arts.ttl: Machino masterclass propels Kiel to big win over Augsburg
arts.sum: Holstein Kiel secured a resounding win over Augsburg, with Shuto Machino scoring twice and assisting twice in a match that saw the home side overturn an early deficit, with Phil Harres also smashing a brace. Augsburg players celebrate Claude-Maurice's early goal near the corner flag, which gave them a short-lived lead - IMAGO/Susanne Hübner, Susanne Huebner

arts.ttl: 15:30 Kickoffs: Mainz, Kiel, and St. Pauli all deliver upset wins
arts.sum: There were plenty of surprises and goals galore in the final set of 15:30 Bundesliga kickoffs of the 2024 calendar year. Three major upsets saw Mainz, Holstein Kiel, and FC St. Pauli topple favored respective opponents Frankfurt, Augsburg, and Stuttgart. In more expected results, Gladbach and Bremen were able to dispatch Hoffenheim and Union Berlin. With no draws, five victorious sides were able to deliver early Christmas presents to their fans.

arts.ttl: Holstein Kiel vs Augsburg preview: Rapp's side looking to end losing run
arts.sum: Holstein Kiel boss Marcel Rapp will hope his side can end a five-game losing run when they welcome Augsburg to the Holstein-Stadion for Saturday's Bundesliga contest.

arts.ttl: Weekend acca predictions: Five teams to back across Europe
arts.sum: James Milton has picked out five teams in action in Europe to include in your weekend acca.

arts.ttl: Preview: Holstein Kiel vs. Augsburg - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Holstein Kiel and Augsburg, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
